quotes.quote: They say an elephant never forgets. What they don't tell you is, you never forget an elephant.
The elephant is never won by anger; nor must that man who would reclaim a lion take him by the teeth.
Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
They say that somewhere in Africa the elephants have a secret grave where they go to lie down, unburden their wrinkled gray bodies, and soar away, light spirits at the end.
No one in the world needs an elephant tusk but an elephant.
I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met.
Th' unwieldy elephant, To make them mirth, us'd all his might, and wreathed His lithe proboscis.
Only elephants should own ivory.
If anyone wants to know what elephants are like, they are like people only more so.
I have a memory like an elephant. In fact, elephants often consult me.
An elephant: A mouse built to government specifications.
You don't shoot elephants, you ride them–you might as well shoot your charger.
She owned the road as an elephant owns the veldt and like a big blue elephant moved with massive grace and dignity.
A novelist is an elephant, but an elephant who must pretend to forget.
When eating an elephant take one bite at a time.
My roommate got a pet elephant. Then it got lost. It's in the apartment somewhere.
If size mattered, the elephant would be the king of the jungle.
When there is an invisible elephant in the room, one is from time to time bound to trip over a trunk.
An Elephant can trumpet and shake the earth but not the self-possession of the ants who hold it.
As an elephant in the battlefield withstands arrows shot from bows all around, even so shall I endure abuse.
Awake. Be the witness of your thoughts. The elephant hauls himself from the mud. In the same way drag yourself out of your sloth.

Elephants love reunions. They recognize one another after years and years of separation and greet each other with wild, boisterous joy. There's bellowing and trumpeting, ear flapping and rubbing. Trunks entwine.
Our elders say that an elephant does not find its own trunk heavy.
He frowned as he struggled to remember. It was like watching an elephant crochet.
He who mounts a wild elephant goes where the elephant goes.
Just in case you thought elephants were all sweetness, I can attest to the fact that this one had the time of her life scaring the bejeezus out of those dudes.
When you have got an Elephant by the hind leg, and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
When there's an elephant in the room introduce him.
Elephants don't know anything about the world of ants; the peaks of mountains are oblivious of what is happening on the plains!
The elephant, the huge old beast, is slow to mate.
Elephants ears are full of blood vessels and help cool the blood as it travels through the extensive vein network that runs close to the surface.
They couldn't hit an elephant at this distance.
I'm an elephant today. I will need to have lots of room and also a bowl of water on the floor.
Mediocrity is the elephant in the room.
The knife flaying the elephant does not have to be large, only sharp!
The elephant has just one basic gait: an ambling walk; elephants cannot run or jump like other animals.
The elephant's a gentleman.
So slowly the hot elephant hearts grow full of desire, and the great beasts mate in secret at last, hiding their fire.
When we are hungry, elephants are food. When we are full, elephants are beautiful.
It was an exceedingly odd thing to see an elephant in a spacesuit.
Elephants, it turns out, are surprisingly stealthy.
Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is 'elephant'.
What is bigger than an elephant? But this also is become man's plaything, and a spectacle at public solemnities; and it learns to skip, dance, and kneel.
It was an elephant. Cause elephants bring good luck, especially if the trunks are up and his trunk was up.
The elephant can survive only if forests survive.
The Indian Elephant is said sometimes to weep.
Elephants can sense danger. They're able to detect an approaching tsunami or earthquake before it hits.
A chain as thick as a palm tree cannot stop an elephant; the vine that proposes to stop the elephant from going to the grassland will go with the elephant.
One digs a pit in the path of the elephant, but the elephant can read signs; the elephant does not go that way.
A blind elephant does not know a man from a tree.
While you sit on an elephant you will be able to break through your neighbor's hedge.
She's big and friendly (Elephant!) Wrinkled and gray (Elephant!) / And with her great big feet, better get out of the way of the elephant (Elephant!)
Sitting on my elephant / Pretty and intelligent / Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na / Gonna take a ride that you won't forget.

Holabaloo, my elephant's jumping / Up and down from side to side / Holabaloo, my elephant's pumping / Elephant ride all over the town / Holabaloo, my elephant's jumping / Inside-out, moving up and down / Holabaloo, my elephant's pumping / Elephant ride in Calcutta town.
Look out! Look out / Pink elephants on parade / Here they come / Hippety hoppety / They're here and there / Pink elephants everywhere.
The elephant, the huge old beast, is slow to mate; / He finds a female, they show no haste they wait.
A true elephant is the one who never forgets his Herculean strength; / the astounding power that reverberated from his body as he strolled; / even in times when he lay timidly wounded on the ground.
All I want is a wild elephant; which swishes tones of water merrily all around with its trunk.

Never ever enter into the brain of the elephant; / or you'll suddenly find yourself a lugubriously disoriented burden to earth; / emanating an infinite groans to just alight your foot an inconspicuous inch from the soil.

To emulate an elephant was very easy; / as all you had to do was inflate your persona like a colossal gas balloon; / tread triumphantly on the soil of the jungle as the largest organism existing in the rampant outgrowths.

Elephants are enslaved ensnared endangered exploited / Elephants are exterminated / They're eradicated / Elephants are eaten / Elephants are forgotten / Fatally forgotten famished fossils / Elephants are gone.
The elephant needs a thousand times more food than the ant but that is not an indication of inequality.
Elephants have the largest brains of any mammal on the face of the Earth. They are creative, altruistic and kind.
Elephants are so wise and so funny and so endangered and so intelligent. I just think there is a lot to learn from them.
And the elephant sings deep in the forest-maze About a star of deathless and painless peace But no astronomer can find where it is.
Although elephants are far more distantly related to us than the great apes, they seem to have evolved similar social and cognitive capacities.
Elephants love to play around. They are very intelligent animals. They have a strong bond, at times stretching to several decades, with their mahouts.
If elephants didn't exist, you couldn't invent one. They belong to a small group of living things so unlikely they challenge credulity and common sense.
